chart.title: Agricultural area over the long-term
chart.subtitle: Total areal land use for agriculture, measured as the combination of land for arable farming (cropland) and grazing in hectares.

Land use: Agriculture.descriptionShort: Total agricultural area for each seperate country over time.
descriptionKey: The order of allocation is as follows: first, we allocate cropland, then rice, then irrigation and finally grazing land.
Land use: Agriculture.descriptionProcessing: We estimate this indicator by summing cropland and grazingland land areas for each country.
Land use: Agriculture.citationShort: HYDE (2023) – with minor processing by Our World in Data
Land use: Agriculture.citationLong: HYDE (2023) – with minor processing by Our World in Data. “Land use: Agriculture” [dataset]. PBL Netherlands Environmental Assessment Agency, “History Database of the Global Environment 3.3” [original data].
